name: Cupid
temple_description:
Cupid was the god of love and eroticism, embodying love and hobbies. 
She was rumored to be the descendant of Venus, though some believe she was actually Eros from Greek mythology. 
She possessed two arrows: a gold arrow that induced love and a lead arrow that sparked hatred when shot into the heart.

active_skills.name: Guardian of Love
active_skills.effect: Heals the entire team by 90% of Cupid's ATK and grants [Guard] to all team members, reducing damage taken by 30% and increasing Debuff RES by 30% for 2 rounds.

active_skills.name: Arrow of Love
active_skills.effect: Inflicts [Weaken], reducing the target's ATK by 60% for 2 rounds. Guaranteed to Crit if the enemy is affected by [Freeze].

exclusive_ur+_skill.name: Amor's Shelter
exclusive_ur+_skill.effect: Upon entering battle, increases Cupid's Debuff RES by 100% for 1 round (non-dispellable). During action, applies [Staunch] to all allies (non-dispellable). Each stack of [Staunch] increases Debuff RES by 5% for 2 rounds (can stack, but duration only refreshes when reactivated).
